cmg.cnsim.engine

Class AbstractSampler

  • java.lang.Object
    • cmg.cnsim.engine.AbstractSampler
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    StandardSampler

    public abstract class AbstractSampler
extends java.lang.Object
    A Sampler is an object that supplies parameters to the simulator. Implementations decide how the parameters are sampled. E.g. a Standard Sampler offers parameters sampled from a Gaussian distribution and a Deterministic sampler, samples based on predifined intervals or data.
    Author:
    Sotirios Liaskos for the Conceptual Modeling Group @ York University

    • Constructor Detail

      • AbstractSampler

        public AbstractSampler()

      • AbstractSampler

        public AbstractSampler(float txArrivalIntervalRate,
                       float txSizeMean,
                       float txSizeSD,
                       float txValueMean,
                       float txValueSD,
                       float nodeHashPowerMean,
                       float nodeHashPowerSD,
                       float nodeElectricPowerMean,
                       float nodeElectricPowerSD,
                       float nodeElectricCostMean,
                       float nodeElectricCostSD,
                       float netThroughputMean,
                       float netThroughputSD,
                       double difficulty)
        Constructs a new AbstractSampler object with the given parameters. Parameters define means and standard deviations of the distribution to be used.
        Parameters:
        txArrivalIntervalRate - The arrival interval rate of transactions (tx/sec).
        txSizeMean - The mean transaction size (bytes).
        txSizeSD - The standard deviation of transaction size (bytes).
        txValueMean - The mean transaction value (local tokens).
        txValueSD - The standard deviation of transaction value (local tokens).
        nodeHashPowerMean - The mean hash power of a node (hashes/second).
        nodeHashPowerSD - The standard deviation of node hash power (hashes/second).
        nodeElectricPowerMean - The mean electric power consumption of a node (Watts).
        nodeElectricPowerSD - The standard deviation of node electric power consumption (Watts).
        nodeElectricCostMean - The mean electric cost of a node (real currency per kWh).
        nodeElectricCostSD - The standard deviation of node electric cost (real currency per kWh).
        netThroughputMean - The mean network throughput (bps).
        netThroughputSD - The standard deviation of network throughput (bps).
        difficulty - The current difficulty level ([Search Space] / [Success Space].
        Throws:
        java.lang.ArithmeticException - if any of the provided values are less than 0.
